com.sadakatsu.clue.testserver

Class TestServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sadakatsu.clue.testserver.TestServer

  • public class TestServer
extends java.lang.Object
    The TestServer handles launching the AIs listed in a script, having them play a single match against each other, then closes them.
    Author:
    Joseph A. Craig

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestServer(java.lang.String launchFilename)
      Instantiates a new TestServer connected to the Players listed in the passed script.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      "java -jar testServer.jar script"
      void run()
      Runs a single game.
